title: Interactive Physical Activity Programs
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to provide interactive physical activity programs tailored to my elderly patients so that I can encourage their physical engagement and monitor their participation remotely.

title: Cognitive Stimulation for Patients
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to provide cognitive stimulation games tailored to my patients' abilities so that I can help maintain their mental health and prevent cognitive decline while fostering engagement during my visits.

title: Progress Tracking for Physical Activities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to monitor my patients' physical activities so that I can encourage them to stay active and detect any changes in their health status early.

title: Personalized Cognitive Engagement for Patients
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to provide personalized cognitive challenges tailored to my patients' abilities so that I can effectively engage them, promote their cognitive health, and reduce feelings of isolation.

title: Feedback Loop for Patient Engagement in Activities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive feedback on the engagement levels of my patients in various activities so that I can better support their emotional well-being and encourage participation in social and cognitive stimulation.

title: Activity Recommendations for Patient Engagement
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to recommend activities based on my patients' interests so that I can encourage their participation in social and cognitive stimulation, ultimately enhancing their emotional well-being and preventing isolation.

title: Guided Tutorials for Engaging Activities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want guided tutorials for new activities so that I can help my patients engage in physical and cognitive exercises, promoting their health and reducing feelings of isolation.

title: Social Engagement Tracking
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to see my patients' activity achievements shared within ALFRED so that I can encourage their participation in social and physical activities, helping to prevent isolation and promote their wellbeing.

title: Adaptive Activity Adjustment
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to adapt activity suggestions based on each patient's health status and engagement level so that I can provide personalized care that encourages physical and cognitive stimulation while considering their unique needs.

title: User Progress Reports for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive user progress reports so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health status and provide timely interventions.
